The drive home was not very comfortable for Madison. The eight-year-old's belly was stuffed full with food, and while she enjoyed being stuffed past her capacities, driving over the bumpy road was not the most pleasant of experiences. When she let out grunts of slight pain though, Wendy bent over and rubbed her tummy in order to make her feel better. Wendy's gentle strokes changes her grunts of pain to grunts of passion.

“Maddi's not feeling very good, Dad”, she said to their father, Hal, who gave them a quick glance over his shoulder and laughed.

“Ate too much, huh?”, he teased affectionately.

“Noooo...”, Madison tried to protest, even though she knew it was very obvious she was lying.

“Well, I know just the remedy for that”, Hal said.

When they finally got home, Hal picked Madison up from inside the car and carried her inside. Wendy followed behind. Usually, she would get envious if their father treated Madison like a little princess, but after the movie and after feeding Madison, she was in too good a mood for it to be tarnished by something so trivial.
Hal carried Madison into the big, comfortable living room and placed her on the sofa, where he wrapped her into a blanket like a toddler. Then he left the room. How bloated Madison was from eating so much food was very obvious now. Ever since they moved here, she had been eating a lot more than before and it had started to show. Even when she hadn't eaten anything, her belly protruded a bit and jiggled whenever she ran. Her butt also had gotten bigger and her face had gotten just a tiny bit more cherubic, too. Wendy and Madison's father wasn't bothered by this at all. He called it “baby fat” and said that growing girls had to eat a lot. But now, just after eating all those snacks, she had a full stomach that stood out as a round, heavy sphere that was obvious even under the blanket. She let out the most petite of burps as she sprawled on the sofa.
Wendy took a cloth from the kitchen to wipe Madison's face.

“You're a spoiled piglet”, she said as she did so. Madison giggled.

Just then, Hal came back and beamed at his two precious daughters.

“I prepared a bath for you, Maddi. It will make your tummy feel much better”, he promised.

“Awesome!”, Madison cheered and raised her arms to indicate that she wanted to be carried to the bathroom.

“Wendy, you may watch TV if you want to”, Hal told his other daughter cheerfully as he lifted Madison up, leaving the blanket behind.

When Madison leaned over her father's shoulder, her stuffed belly pressed against his chest and she had to burp again.

“Urp... 'scuse me”, she murmured under her breath.

Hal just laughed and carried her outside. Wendy sat on the sofa with the remote control and wrapped herself into the blanket that had been preheated by her rotund sister.

The bathroom was warm, lit by the nice modern LED lights from above, with a white and cream interior and a glossy natural stone tub in which water shimmered promisingly. Her spandex pants were really tight on her, they wedged into the crack of her slightly bigger butt. Her tank top stretched over her stuffed stomach. Even before, it was next to impossible for Hal to be mad at Madison, but now, he was close to melting under her sweet gaze.

13212.content:
As before, Madison was fed by her older sister Wendy. The older girl enjoyed spoiling her little sis almost as much as Hal did, and so Maddi sat happily in Wendy's lap at the dinner table, being fed two forkfuls of lasagne for every one that Wendy ate herself. Despite being only eight years old, Madison was already thoroughly used to habitual overeating; with a father and a sister who both enjoyed treating the young girl like a pampered princess, she typically wound up quite stuffed by the end of every meal – and with Hal’s disinterest in healthy eating, those meals were typically heavy, fatty dishes that were as bad for the waistline as they tasted good.

And this meal was no exception. Though she felt much better now than she had before her bath, Madison’s stomach was really still quite full from her overindulgence earlier in the day, and Wendy was feeding her much more quickly than she would have been eating herself. The lasagne tasted so good though that she didn’t even think of protesting, even as her stomach swelled fuller and rounder beneath her oversized top with every mouthful she swallowed of the rich pasta.
“You’re such a little piggy, Maddi,” Wendy giggled, prodding another heaping forkful of lasagne between her little sister’s waiting lips, “I’m surprised you haven’t grown a little pig tail by now.”
The teasing was good-natured. Madison enjoyed being doted upon; she was perfectly happy with her sister calling her a piggy if it meant she got to keep being so thoroughly pampered. Swallowing her mouthful, she wriggled her plump backside against her sister’s lap.
“No tail, see!” she giggled loudly, and Hal and Wendy both laughed.

“No tail, but it looks like the little piggy’s got some sauce on its snout,” Hal smiled, leaning across the table to wipe a little smudge of red from his little princess’s nose, “How’s the lasagne?”
“Great!” Madison replied, “You’re the best cook in the world.” She let Wendy feed her another mouthful as though to prove her point, though beneath her baggy top her belly was beginning to reach its limits once again, bulging roundly with the sheer volume of food stored within.
“Yeah, it really is good, Dad,” Wendy agreed, actually eating a mouthful herself for once. Her habit of feeding Madison before eating herself was likely the only thing that was keeping Wendy from growing as plump as her little sister, as she had quite an appetite herself when she actually got around to indulging.

“I’m glad to hear it,” he smiled, proud of both his cooking and his delightful little girls. To him, they were flawless; the extra weight his youngest was carrying, as well as the bad habits the whole family shared, were both completely invisible to him. The fact that his eight year old and twelve year old had just polished off enough food to feed two grown adults seemed, to him, perfectly acceptable; after all, he was just making sure his babies were properly fed. And on the note of ‘properly fed’… “So, who’s for dessert? I bought ice cream!”

Madison hesitated. She was already stuffed, already close to her limit – but before she could say anything Wendy was already nodding yes, and at the sight of the ice cream itself her doubts melted away despite themselves. She had a sweet tooth a mile wide, and so despite her stomach grumbling and groaning beneath her top, she let Wendy take a big spoonful of ice cream straight out of the tub and push it straight into her mouth.
Immediately her fullness was forgotten as the sugary treat passed her lips, and she swallowed eagerly.
“More please!” she pleaded, opening her mouth once again to be fed like a hungry baby bird, and Wendy promptly obliged. Delicious!

By the time the meal was over, much of the tub of ice cream was inside Maddi’s little belly, churning away noisily along with a huge portion of lasagne and the food from earlier in the day. The amount she’d managed to eat was legitimately astonishing, but neither Hal nor Wendy saw it as anything but a bit of cute indulgence, natural for a healthy young girl like Madison. As Hal carried Maddi up to her room to sleep off this huge meal, his muscles strained under the burden of his youngest’s plump body.
“You really are growing into a big girl,” he grinned happily, stroking her hair away from her face as he laid her down on her bed. Her belly bulged up before her, the American flag design stretched across her swollen stomach, and Hal patted it gently, “I’m glad you inherited my appetite instead of your mother’s! She was always an unhealthily light eater.”
Madison smiled herself as he tucked her in, delighted enough to be spoiled that she could ignore the way her overstuffed belly twinged as he patted it. He gave her one last kiss on the forehead, then left her room, turning out the light on another overindulgent day in a life that lately seemed to consist of little else.

Sarah arrived in the kitchen to see a table full of towering stacks of pancakes, each almost as tall as she was, and dripping with thick syrup. Her mother was standing beside a strange machine that she had never seen before.

"What's that mommy?"

Startled by her daughters sudden appearance she turned around.

"Oh, this is a new machine I won in a contest to help me make food for you."

Sarah bounded on the balls of her feet in excitement causing the cupboards to rattle and her belly to jiggle violently, but then she stopped as she realized something.

"Was I that much work to feed?" she asked quietly?

Her mother sighed. "Well you do eat a lot Sarah, that's why I'm glad I got this machine..."

Her mother's voice trailed off as she was having difficulty deciding what to say, while in Sarah's mind things were different.

She realized that her appetite would have eventually outstripped her mother's ability to feed her, and horrifying images of her making a pig of herself while her mother slaved away and starved made her tremble. The images made her seem like the wicked stepmother from Cinderella.

She put one hand on her bulbous gut and looked back up at her mother.

"Did you eat Mommy?"

Her mother blinked and then replied. "Yes, I ate before I started making your breakfast."

"Okay then. From now on for Breakfast Lunch, and Dinner, you have to eat before me. That way you always get food."

Her mother looked puzzled for a moment and then she realized what her daughter was trying to do. She leaned down and gave Sarah a playful kiss on the cheek.

"Okay Sarah, I promise. Now go eat before your pancakes get cold."

Sarah didn't need to be told twice. She waddled over to the chair and with a bit of a struggled climbed on top of it. She needed to stand on the chair in order to reach the top of the immense tower of pancakes. She looked down and realized she would have to be careful because her belly was nearly touching the tower and if she wasn't careful she would end up knocking it over.


"Thanks for the food mom!" she called out and then grabbed the top four pancakes and brought them to her waiting mouth.

Syrup dripped from her mouth and the pancakes onto her shirt and the uncovered top of her belly. She giggled as she felt the sticky substance slowly slide off her belly onto the floor.

She gobbled down the pancakes in her hands in a shameless barbaric display of eating habits that her mother had gotten used to by now. Sarah continued down the stack until she had to sit down, or risk falling over from the weight of her belly. She resumed eating the stack, finding it a bit difficult to reach but still manageable until she had finished every pancake on the plate, and then she licked the plate clean of syrup. Then she used her hands and tongue to clean herself of syrup, her belly which now reached just past her knees was thick with syrup.

Sarah patted her belly in satisfaction and then looked up at all the uneaten stacks of pancakes still standing on the table, like the skyscrapers of a large city.

Grinning she stood up, her belly bumping the table as she did so and then stepped onto the table itself so she could reach the remaining stacks. Standing among the stacks she felt like a giantess, a Godzilla, ready to devour the city of pancakes. She giggled at the though and made playful roaring sounds before resuming her breakfast.

Because her belly now stuck out as far as her arms could reach she was forced to approach the stacks at an angle, but she compensated by standing in between two stacks and eating two at once.

She rapidly devoured both stacks, feeling her belly swell bigger and bigger.

When finished those stacks she was sitting on the table, her belly almost at her ankles and it was so big she almost couldn't see in front of her.

Bbbuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuurrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrppppppppp

She felt better after a good belch and she got to her feet with surprising ease and resumed.

Her mother watched in awe as her daughters belly seemed to defy gravity as Sarah devoured the stacks of pancakes with great zeal and her belly only got bigger and rounder without hanging much lower than it did before. Even though her belly stuck out almost at her feet when she was sitting; when she was standing her belly button was at the same height as her pelvis.

Now finishing the final stack, Sarah was forced to sit with her legs spread in order to accommodate her immense gut which now reached past her feet as she gobbled up the last few pancaked from the plate in her hands.

The unsung hero of all this was the table which had somehow been able to support her without collapsing. She would have to give Sarah her meals on the floor from now on, and if things continued, the basement.

Sarah smacked her lips, finally finished her breakfast. She stood up and then carefully climbed down from the table onto the chair and then the floor.

From straight on, Sarah's mother could see just how wide her gut was too. It was twice as wide as Sarah's still fairly petite frame, and Sarah had to physically carry her belly in her hands to keep it from sloshing about too much.

Sarah walked up to her, her entire body, but especially her face and belly were dripping with syrup.

"I'm full now", Sarah said happily. "Thanks again for all the food." She patted her taught belly for emphasis. "I loved it".

"Go into the tub and clean yourself off", her mother told her.

"Okay."

Meanwhile her mother would have to clean everything up.

Not wanting to disturb her, Terri grabbed her sister's stuffed cupcake and blanket and tucked her in right there on the couch.
Waiting just long enough for her to fall into a deep sleep before tube feeding her another gallon and a half of the shake
over the course of the night. She hoped the little girl's tummy could handle the little extra tonight as after the third pour
Tori started to stir. Merely a shift of her body weight. Her bloated gut sloshing as she rolled over.

14231212122212121.content:
The new feeding routine for Tori, including the excess of "Princess Potion", had become normal by now.
Just over a month since it started Tori had ballooned due to the influx of calories and decrease of activity.
Only a week into the routine Tori had gotten so used to sleeping on the couch that it became where she
stayed. After a full morning of filling her belly, Terri finally got Tori to actually get up for more than just a
slow waddle to the bathroom. Bringing the scale into the living room she helped her now-massive little
sister step on to it.

Every inch of her bulged and folded with excess fat. Her once only slightly pudgy belly
now hung below her knees. Her thick cankles brushing the top of the scale as they hung around her chubby
feet. She hadn't really noticed it until Tori stood upright, but Terri couldn't help seeing that due to the width
of her torso and the great sacks of flesh that hung from Tori's upper arms, that the little girl couldn't lower
them very far anymore. At their lowest the lay at around a 45-degree angle at the shoulders. It brought her a
strange sense of pride to see how fat she had helped the young Tori become. Even Tori herself, in spite of her
exhaustion from being forced to be upright on her own two failing legs, seemed to beam with pride when Terri
read her weight aloud.

Incredibly the little Tori had over doubled her weight! Weighing in at an astounding 558 pounds, accomplished
the little girl collapsed back on to the couch. Without hesitation insisting on more Princess Potion.
Terri hesitated. She had honestly never planned on fattening her little sister this much. Yet then again,
as she saw her six years old sister delighted by her girth, demanding more of the concoction that had
done this obscene act to her, she couldn't help but want to keep going. Before going to make the shake, she kneeled
down next to the blubbery mound that was her little sister.
"Tori honey... Are you really sure you want to get fatter still?" Terri paused. Waiting for a quick reply. None followed as
Tori was already back to shoveling snacks in her face. Terri continued to prod. "Cause ya know... if you get much fatter..."
She paused again, looking at the immense Frieda on the screen. Noticing how proportionally she was still fatter than
young Tori, she was in fact immobile! The other characters cheered her inability to walk or stand, with Tori joining in with
the chant. "Too big to move HOORAY!!! Too big to move HOORAY!!" Terri shifted her tone.
"Toni honey, I want to ask you one more time okay?" She turned from the screen, looking a little annoyed.
"I know, I know but I want to be sure. Your friend there on TV, Freida. She got soooo fat she can't walk anymore right?"
Tori nodded.
"And you said you want to be as big as her, right?"
Still agitated, Tori nodded again.
"So just so I understand. Does that mean you want to be so fat you can't walk, or stand, or get out of bed too?"
This time Tori replied. "Yeah! If I am allowed to." Terri lurched forward and squeezed as much of the obese six-year-old as
she could get her arms around.
"Of course you can! I will help you back to your bed and then bring the big tv back there for you!"

Even with the prospect of having to walk, Tori was excited. As she made the slow, waddle by waddle journey, having to stop
every other step to rest, Toni took a turn to ask a question. "If I drink Princess Potion all day, do you think I could get even fatter
than Frieda?" Terri's heart skipped a beat. Even she hadn't gone as far as to try and suggest an all gain shake diet.
This could result in some very interesting things.
14231212122212121.title: Another month passes.

choices: More adventures with the now 1,000 pound 7 year old?
142312121222121211.content:
Another two months pass with Tori on the full shake diet. Within a few days of starting it, Terri had to resort to using
the feeding tube she had made in secret months ago just to keep up with how much Tori wanted the shake.
Since getting into bed when the new diet started, she hadn't left since. Terri had gotten her a bedpan and
puppy training pads for her to use when she needed to go to the bathroom. As the days went by Tori just
kept growing bigger and bigger. It seemed immobility had agreed with her as over those two months she
had again ballooned. Though towards the end of the second month, Terri noticed the no matter how much
she fed her sister, her gains had finally plateaued. It had been another week and she had seen no real obvious change
to Tori's girth. Sadly, she knew that one day this might happen. But on the bright side, with her lack of mobility, insatiable
appetite, and pension for the Princess Potion, there was no foreseeable way she would ever be shedding a single ounce.
Content with herself, Terri arranged to have her immense sister weighed. It took three of them to help her get up plus the assistance
of a fourth to keep her standing long enough to stand on the scale. After the whole ordeal was over and the mound of child flesh
lay back in her bed, Terri finally told her sister how much she now weighed. Even with the feeding tube in her mouth, Terri could see
her sister try to smile around it as she told her that she weighed 990 pounds. A full 150 pounds heavier than the "weight" of the Freida
character. Both so happy with their little adventure, Terri laid the far too small blanket over Tori massive belly and kissed her on her
massively blubbery cheek while positioning the stuffed cupcake in the folds between Tori's upper arm and bust before refilling the tank that
hung above her with more of her beloved Princess Potion. All the while promising that she would do her best to help Tori gain those
last 10 pounds before her 7th birthday next week. Taking her to a full thousand pounds.

True to her word, Terri found a way to do it. But within days of cresting four digits, once again her weight stalled.
But still, they both were happy.
142312121222121211.title: Say yes and jump ahead in time.

1423121212221212112.content:
While Tori never again gained as rapidly as she had that summer, she did continue to get bigger as her life went on.
Happily spent the rest of her days as a massive blob of fat with Terri happily caring for her every need.
Eventually even becoming famous as the fattest kid, teen, woman, and person to have ever lived as her life progressed.
Officially setting the record at an astounding 1,986 pounds at the age of only 22. Though Terri swore the scale was off
and her kid sister had crossed the Ton threshold. Regardless, there was no question that Tori was the fattest alive, to have
ever lived, and would more than like hold that title for quite some time.

The End.

14422.content:
"Oh." Stupid big city traffic.

"Yeah, I can stay here until you pick me up."

"OK, see you soon too, Uncle Junpei. Byeee."

Well that was a bit of a bummer. She'd kinda been hoping to start this vacation off right but Atlanta had other things to say about that. Now the question was, what to do in the meantime.

Her stomach grumbled an answer to her. Going from Japan to America was a LONG flight and she didn't have much of a way to pay the flight attendant for refreshments. Or at least... she didn't think she did. In any case, she was starving and couldn't wait until her Uncle got here to eat.

Luckily, like most airports, this one was stocked with a large food court for flight passengers. And like a greasy angel from above, she could always trust the welcoming golden arches of McDonald's. The name may be difficult to read, English wasn't her best subject, but you could always recognize the logo.

Walking to the front counter, she did notice a small problem. She normally ordered a kid's meal, but that was difficult to do when you changed the language. Buuut... she could count on English. And they had a lovely menu board with pictures of food and large numbers she could recognize. And was she not grown up enough for a grown-up combo? No toy, unfortunately, but she was proud of the ingenuity of her plan.

Keeping it simple, she ordered a number one, number two, and number three. Simple enough. Her parents had been kind enough to provide her with an American credit card too, just in case she needed to buy something. It may be a tad much, but a little known secret was that she absolutely loved fast food. Nobody had to know she ate all that.

When her order got there, though, she realized she MAY have made a mistake. Combos weren't just the pictures shown on the menu board. Four burgers (since the number two had two burgers), three drinks, and more fries than she'd ever expected. What did her mom always say about her eyes being bigger than her stomach?

She cautiously peeked around the corner as if someone might be watching her. She couldn't waste all this food. She WOULDN'T waste all this food. Three drinks, that was one for her and both Uncle Junpei and his wife. She'd eat what she could and bag up what she couldn't. Though she still had to eat a lot, just so her Uncle didn't ask her why she had all this food.

Twenty minutes later, she was feeling pretty sorry for herself. This was a bad idea. This was a terrible, terrible idea. She had succeeded in eating a large amount of the food, but at the cost of her own well-being. She was feeling quite ill to her stomach. But at least there wouldn't be any unwanted questions.

Startling her from her food-induced stupor, her pocket began vibrating urgently. A text message! She grabbed the phone and clicked it on with a speed that surely must be world record pace. Guilt did fun things with your reflexes.

Rachel was a cute little blonde girl with blue eyes and of course an Australian accent. Living in Australia, Rachel was accustomed to an active lifestyle, true to her Aussie girl character, from playing in the outback, seeing koalas and kangaroos, and swimming. After watching yet another story on the news about a cute young girl getting kidnapped, concerned parents felt obligated to do something. Worried mothers called one another expressing their fear of their daughter being abducted. Each phone call was the same, "Did you hear another adorable girl went missing?" "It happened again another girl was taken while playing outside." "Its always the pretty girls that get taken." were among some of the common verses. However one mother came up with an unusual proposal.

"What if we fattened all of the pretty girls?" pondered a mother.

"What, fatten our own girls? Are you mad?!" replied a skeptical mom.

"No really, think about it, if the girls are fat, they won't have the urge to go outside and play making them vulnerable to abduction." reasoned the mother. "And since its always the prettier girls getting target, we'll spend extra effort on fattening them up."

"The other girls would copy the pretty girls..." a mom rationalized the theory.

"That's brilliant! We'll feed the girls tons of food, fattening them up, thwart their urge for outdoor activities and have them stay home and safe." explained a mother.

The women all consented to the idea and implemented it immediately. The girls found what would transpire next to be bizarre. Each girl woke up to be greeted with a huge breakfast, a huge stack of waffles drenched in syrup, bacon, and heavily buttered toast. The young girls struggled to eat it all but the concerned mothers forced it upon them. The girls left for school with bulging bellies filled with food only to return home for another feast. Some moms made the meals others picked up fast food which they consumed while watching tv, which the women fiercely encouraged to be watched. The prettier girls received very large portions of food, girls with milky skin, big eyes, and long flowing hair. As this routine was practiced the girl abduction dropped to zero, all the while the slim girls plumped up.

Foods of all sorts lavished the house. Pizza rolls were constantly supplied, sweets were frequently baked, snacks were always within reach. Indeed the mothers were devoted to keeping their pretty girls fat and safe. In fact, focusing so much attention on food had resulted in the worried moms gaining weight too.

"Hey mom can we go outside?"

"Oh Lana, why don't you and your friends watch a movie, I just baked some pizza rolls." suggested the mother pulling out a hot baking sheet loaded with the fatty pizza rolls.

"Mooom! Me and my friends have been eating those all day!" pouted Lana. "We want to go outside."

"Well how bout I bake you and your friends some yummy cupcakes or perhaps you'd rather have cookies. I guess I could make both."

"But mom we're full!" whined Lana.

"Oh nonsense you're all far too thin. You're all growing girls afterall." assured Lana's mother patting her daughter's belly.

Lana glared at her imposing mother.

"Tell ya what if you can get everyone to eat all the pizza rolls I'll take you to the mall tomorrow."

Lana's eyes lit up at her mother's proposal.

"Okay." Lana said taking the pizza rolls to her friends pleasing her mother.

"Hey girls!" Lana called out "We can't go out but we can watch a movie instead. And we got more yummy pizza rolls." Lana attempts to convince her friends to eat more so she could be rewarded with a trip to the mall.

The response was mixed some girls were full and tired of eating but some loved all the feasting. Lana's friends who were once svelte girls running around had plumped up, no longer possessing the vigor of their past skinny selves. Her mother's persistent feedings had clearly affected Lana. A month earlier Lana was a thin active girl. Her long platinum blonde hair was familiar to the breeze of wind blowing through it. Her nimble body was agile and constantly expelling energy. Lana's days were quite active as were her friends. The youthful antics had kept their bodies petite. That came to an abrupt end with their mothers sternly discouraging them from going outside and feverishly pressured them with copious servings of food.

"Hey why do our moms keep making us eat so much?" asked one girl grabbing a roll.

"I don't know, but at least the food's yummy." a girl answered as she chewed.

"I made cookies!!!" announced Lana's mom entering the room.

"Mom we're all fat!" Lana yelled.

The mother didn't expect the girls to realize and than had to devise a plan to placate the girls.
